title._content: Boat crew of the "Picture" at Diamond Creek (LOC)

description._content: O'Sullivan, Timothy H., 1840-1882, photographer. Boat crew of the "Picture" at Diamond Creek [United States], 1871. 1 photographic print on stereo card : albumen. Notes: Photo shows photographer Timothy O'Sullivan, fourth from left, with fellow members of the Wheeler survey and Indians, following ascent of the Colorado River through the Black Canyon. Original negative number: 150. Title from item. Part of series: U.S. War Dept., Corps of Engineers; Geographical Explorations and Surveys West of 100th Meridian, Expedition of 1871; Lieut. Geo. M. Wheeler, commanding. Published in: Framing the West: The Survey Photographs of Timothy H. O'Sullivan / Toby Jurovics, Carol M. Johnson, Glenn Willumson, and William F. Stapp. New Haven: Yale University Press, 2010, p. 34. Format: Expedition photographs--1870-1880. Stereographs--1870-1880. Albumen prints--1870-1880. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/stereo.1s00176 Call Number: LOT 3427-1, no. 32 [item]
